titleStmt.title: An elegy on the death of the Queen by C.D. rector of K. in S.
titleStmt.author: C. D. (Charles Darby), d. 1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Chamberlain ... and are to be sold by Peter Parker ... and John Whitlock ....,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Darby by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
